description: Application under Section 73A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 19/02142/FUL (Variation of condition 2 (drawings) of planning permission ref 16/13215/FUL (Erection of a part ground and first floor, part first floor and mansard roof extensions to existing building to facilitate 8 self-contained units comprising 1 x 1 bed and 7 x 2 bed units and the erection of a two storey building comprising 2 x 3 bed pair of semi-detached dwellinghouses and associated landscaping, cycle and refuse storage.) to facilitate minor exterior alterations) dated: 22/07/2020. Variation to consist of changes to dormers on front elevation, removal of the proposed doors and windows on the southern end of the ground floor of the principal elevation, removal of the proposed windows on the ground floor of the proposed southern elevation and alterations to the windows on the rear roof slope, replacing the curved window design with square casements used on-site
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved by approval 18/12055/COND (condition 3 of planning permission 16/13215/FUL)Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of the neighbouring properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved by approval 19/00570/COND (condition 4 of planning permission 16/13215/FUL)Reason: In the interests of sustainability and energy conservation in accordance with Policy 5.3 (Sustainable Design & Construction) of the London Plan (July 2016) and Policy DM1 (Sustainable Design and Construction Standards) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved by approval 19/00570/COND (condition 9 of planning permission 16/13215/FUL)Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of the neighbouring properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved by approval 19/00570/COND (condition 6 of planning permission 16/13215/FUL)Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of the neighbouring properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved by approval 18/12236/COND (condition 7 of planning permission 16/13215/FUL)Reason: It is necessary to provide these details prior to commencement in order to ensure that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and highway safety is safeguarded and ensure the free flow of traffic in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved by approval 18/12055/COND (condition 8 of planning permission 16/13215/FUL)Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of the neighbouring properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved by approval 19/00570/COND (condition 5 of planning permission 16/13215/FUL)Reason: To ensure the provision of satisfactory cycle storage facilities and in the interests of highway safety in accordance with Policy OM8 (Sustainable Transport for New Developments) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
